Title: AN ACT AMENDING ACT NUMBERED ONE HUNDRED AND THREE, EXTENDING THE PROVISIONS OF THE PROVINCIAL GOVERNMENT ACT TO THE PROVINCE OF TAYABAS.
Data:
[ Act No. 458, September 11, 1902 ]
AN ACT AMENDING ACT NUMBERED ONE HUNDRED AND THREE, EXTENDING THE PROVISIONS OF THE PROVINCIAL GOVERNMENT ACT TO THE PROVINCE OF TAYABAS.
By authority of the United States, be it enacted by the Philippine Commission, that:
Section 1. Section two of Act Numbered One hundred and three, extending the provisions of the Provincial Government Act to the Province of Tayabas, is hereby amended by increasing the salary of the provincial secretary to one thousand three hundred and fifty dollars per annum, in money of the United States.1a—àphi1
Section 2. The public good requiring the speedy enactment of this bill, the passage of the same is hereby expedited in accordance with section two of "An Act prescribing the order of procedure by the Commission in the enactment of laws," passed September twenty-sixth, nineteen hundred.
Section 3. This Act shall take effect on its passage.
Enacted, September 11, 1902.
